Crawl date: 2016/09/28 06:03:24
Title: Girls Love Shopping - For & Against
Number of arguments: 14

Claim: Girls Love Shopping - For & Against
For: I LOVE it!!!! I can't wait to go to the mall i go evry other week. Some don't but they are just retarted then. What's not love about shopping you get new stuff to wear.
For: Whats not to love...?
For: Very goodn point nazar
For: All the girls I know love it. It's one of those stereotypes that's actually correct. Obviously, there are exceptions.
For: I no everyone is different, but am a girl and i love to shop! Probably just coincidence like. Lol
For: This one sure does.
Against: Not everyone love shopping! You cant force them!!
Against: Maybe, but not all of them. Some of my friends who are girls hate to go shopping, unless its really necessary.
Against: Not all girls love to shop. However things do need to be purchased from time to time and so one might as well enjoy it.
Against: Not al girls. Personaly, I see no reason to go to the mall unless I have to or I want something to do. Its a last resort for me.
Against: Collectively not all girls love to shop. Girls that are obsessed with it, i find they are so hard to talk to. I, myself, will shop occasionaly, i dont love it, i dont hate it.
Against: Who Cares? I don't, and I don't like to shop for the sake of shopping. I go out with the intent of getting what ever I require to acquire.
Against: I'm a girl and I hate to shop! But every girl is different, some love to shop. Some like to shop and some hate to shop!(like me)
Against: No, they just need to
MetaData.Title: Girls Love Shopping

Premise: I'm a girl and I hate to shop! But every girl is different, some love to shop. Some like to shop and some hate to shop!(like me)
Who Cares? I don't, and I don't like to shop for the sake of shopping. I go out with the intent of getting what ever I require to acquire.
Collectively not all girls love to shop. Girls that are obsessed with it, i find they are so hard to talk to. I, myself, will shop occasionaly, i dont love it, i dont hate it.
Not al girls. Personaly, I see no reason to go to the mall unless I have to or I want something to do. Its a last resort for me.
Not all girls love to shop. However things do need to be purchased from time to time and so one might as well enjoy it.
Maybe, but not all of them. Some of my friends who are girls hate to go shopping, unless its really necessary.
Not everyone love shopping! You cant force them!!
I no everyone is different, but am a girl and i love to shop! Probably just coincidence like. Lol
All the girls I know love it. It's one of those stereotypes that's actually correct. Obviously, there are exceptions.
I LOVE it!!!! I can't wait to go to the mall i go evry other week. Some don't but they are just retarted then. What's not love about shopping you get new stuff to wear.
